<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Holistic Care](/Feats.aspx?ID=6376) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 208 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=257)

**Prerequisites**
[Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=6375); Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

</column>

---

You provide emotional and spiritual care. Add [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76), [stupefied](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94), and [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=93) to the list of conditions you can reduce with [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=6375). If the stunned condition has a duration instead of a value, you can’t use Treat Condition to reduce it.
